mapper.select: select * from iop_public.ooi_activity_summary_effect where activity_id in (${activityIds}) and DATE_FORMAT(data_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{date}
mapper.insert:
insert into iop_93006_info ( count_time, province, city, activity_id, activity_name, campaign_id, campaign_name, spetopic_id, iop_activity_id ) values
( #{item.countTime},#{item.province},#{item.city},#{item.activityId},#{item.activityName},#{item.campaignId}, #{item.campaignName},#{item.spetopicId},#{item.iopActivityId} )

insert into iop_93006 select b.count_time, b.province, b.city, a.phone_no, b.activity_id, b.activity_name, 'null', 'null', 'null', 'null', 'null', a.is_touch, a.is_join_activity, a.is_marketed from iop_93006_info b inner join iop_public.ooi_activity_detail_effect_${activityEndDate} a on a.activity_id = b.iop_activity_id

insert into iop_93004
select #{city}, #{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{campaignId}, #{campaignName}, #{campaignStartTime}, #{campaignEndTime}, #{channelId}, #{channeTypeOne}, #{channeTypeTwo}, #{channelName}, #{positionId}, #{positionidOne}, #{positionidTwo}, #{positionName}, b.PHONE_NO, b.IMEI, #{proName}, #{proCode}, #{proCodeSplite} from ${finalObjTableName} a inner join dw_terminal_imei_user_yx_d b on a.PHONE_NO = b.PHONE_NO
insert into iop_93011 select distinct phone_no from user_list_type
